description: WEBPNP files are often distributed using the Web Point-and-Print Protocol ([MS-WPRN]), which defines a method for downloading print drivers when a user clicks on a webpage link (an HTTP request) or a client program requests a driver. The website locates the appropriate driver and then returns a WEBPNP file to the requester. Once downloaded, the file can be opened to install the printer drivers.
WEBPNP files may contain the following contents:
WEBPNP files are executed by the Windows program wpnpinst.exe which is located in the ~/​Windows/​System32 directory.
